Containers.Name: Cryptomator WebDAV
Containers.Description: [b]Description[/b][br] Cryptomator allows for local file level encryption with transparent access through a local GUI application. See https://cryptomator.org [br] Cryptomator WebDAV allows you to server a local stored Cryptomator vault over WebDAV, allowing access through third party WebDav tools such as rclone, Mountain Duck, CyberDuck etc. [b]Configuration[/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the application will store its configuration files, database and logs etc.[br] [b]/vault[/b] This is the local cryptomator vault files.[br][br] [b]Documentation[/b][br] https://github.com/greycubesgav/cryptomator-webdav-unraid/[br][br]
Containers.Overview: Cryptomator WebDAV allows you to server a local stored Cryptomator vault over WebDAV, allowing access through third party WebDav tools such as rclone, Mountain Duck, CyberDuck etc. See https://cryptomator.org

Config.Name: Cryptomator Vault Location
Config.Description: The location of the local Cryptomator vault files

Config.Name: Cryptomator Vault Pass
Config.Description: The password for your local cryptomator vault
